languages.text: {n}Гигантскими заревами вспыхнули рухнувшие на планету остовы погибших кораблей — впечатляющая демонстрация силы и могущества Вольного Торговца, обернувше{mf|го|й} сами небеса против врагов.{/n}
{n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гигантскими заревами вспыхнули рухнувшие на планету остовы погибших кораблей — впечатляющая демонстрация силы и могущества Вольного Торговца, обернувше{mf|го|й} сами небеса против врагов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The wreckages of the downed ships had come crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who turned the sky itself against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}舰船的残骸轰然坠地，燃起熊熊烈火。这正是行商浪人力量与权威的惊人显现，{mf|他|她}足以驱使广袤的天空本身对抗{mf|他的|她的}敌人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰船的残骸轰然坠地，燃起熊熊烈火。这正是行商浪人力量与权威的惊人显现，{mf|他|她}足以驱使广袤的天空本身对抗{mf|他的|她的}敌人。{/n}
{n}被摧毁舰船的残骸轰然坠地，燃起熊熊烈火。这正是行商浪人力量与权威的惊人显现，{mf|他|她}足以驱使天空本身对抗{mf|他的|她的}敌人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las naves destrozadas se estrellaron con una gran deflagración, en una impresionante demostración de la fuerza y el poder {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, que volvió el cielo mismo contra sus enemigos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las naves destrozadas se estrellaron con una gran deflagración, en una impresionante demostración de la fuerza y el poder {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, que volvió el cielo mismo contra sus enemigos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}墜落した船の残骸が炎上しながら崩れ落ちてきた...天空そのものを自らの敵へと向けたローグトレーダーの強さと権力を示す強烈なデモンストレーションとなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}墜落した船の残骸が炎上しながら崩れ落ちてきた...天空そのものを自らの敵へと向けたローグトレーダーの強さと権力を示す強烈なデモンストレーションとなった。{/n}
{n}墜落した船の残骸が炎上しながら崩れ落ちてきた...天空そのものを自らの敵へと向けたローグトレーダーの強さと権力を示す強烈なデモンストレーションとなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les épaves des vaisseaux s'écrasent dans un véritable enfer ardent. Cette impressionnante démonstration de force et de puissance de la part {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, fait littéralement tomber le ciel sur la tête de ses ennemis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les épaves des vaisseaux s'écrasent dans un véritable enfer ardent. Cette impressionnante démonstration de force et de puissance de la part {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, fait littéralement tomber le ciel sur la tête de ses ennemis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die zerstörten Schiffe stürzten wie riesige Feuerbälle ab ... eine beeindruckende Demonstration der Stärke und Macht {mf|des Freihändlers, der|der Freihändlerin, die} den Himmel selbst gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde einsetzte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zerstörten Schiffe stürzten wie riesige Feuerbälle ab ... eine beeindruckende Demonstration der Stärke und Macht {mf|des Freihändlers, der|der Freihändlerin, die} den Himmel selbst gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde einsetzte.{/n}

{n}Die Wracks der abgestürzten Schiffe stürzten als riesige Flammenbälle hinab — eine beeindruckende Demonstration der Stärke und Macht {mf|des Freihändlers, der|der Freihändlerin, die} den Himmel selbst gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde einsetzte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Enkaza dönen gemiler, heybetli alevler eşliğinde yeryüzüne çöktü. Böylece gökyüzünü bile düşmanlarının aleyhine çevirebilen Hür Tacir'in kuvveti ve kudreti, etkileyici bir şekilde sergilenmiş oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wrecked ships came crashing down in great flames — an impressive demonstration of the strength and power of the Rogue Trader, who had turned the very sky against {mf|his|her} enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Enkaza dönen gemiler, heybetli alevler eşliğinde yeryüzüne çöktü. Böylece gökyüzünü bile düşmanlarının aleyhine çevirebilen Hür Tacir'in kuvveti ve kudreti, etkileyici bir şekilde sergilenmiş oldu.{/n}
